Text: The Soul Man is an American sitcom created by Suzanne Martin and Cedric the Entertainer.
Triplets:<The Soul Man
1:
--------------------
Text: The Soul Man:  The series is a spin-off from "Hot in Cleveland", in which Cedric guest starred in the 2011 episode "Bridezelka", the backdoor pilot for "The Soul Man".
Triplets:<The Soul Man
2:
--------------------
Text: The Soul Man:  The series premiered on TV Land on June 20, 2012 with a 12-episode order.
